message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that budget is a concern for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $105. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $100. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for this product. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at $98. It's a small compromise, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $96, but no lower. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
